post.text: #ICYMI: Today I delivered my Foreign Policy speech at Youngstown State University. TOGETHER, WE will MAKE AMERICA SAFE AGAIN!

comment.author: Cannon
comment.text: "Those who did not believe in our Constitution or who support bigotry and hatred will not be admitted for immigration into our country." Sounds like The Donald is trying to get himself deported

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: Cannon you sound like a brain dead Democrat'!! I feel sorry for you! We will all pray for your recovery!

replies.author: Cannon
replies.text: Huh? Trump showed he doesn't believe in the constitution when he said Kazir Khan "had no right" to say what he did (freedom of speech is guaranteed in the First Amendment, right?) and if you need me to provide bigoted quotes or hate speech from Donald, then you haven't been paying attention. I'm no Hillary fan either BTW

replies.author: Garan
replies.text: Explain how Cannon . You are clueless.
